svt_i2c_master Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_i2c_master:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This class is Driver that implements an I2C Master Driver component. The events available at the master driver are as follows :

  • EVENT_START_GENERATED : signals START condition from master
  • EVENT_STOP_GENERATED : signals STOP condition from master
  • EVENT_ACK_GENERATED : signals ACK generated from master
  • EVENT_NACK_GENERATED : signals NACK generated from master
  • EVENT_ACK_RECEIVED : signals ACK received by master
  • EVENT_NACK_RECEIVED : signals NACK received by master
  • EVENT_REPEATED_START_GENERATED : signals REPEATED START condition
  • EVENT_START_BYTE_TRANSMITED : signals START BYTE from master
  • EVENT_GENERAL_CALL_ADDR_SENT : signals GENERAL CALL command address sent from master
  • EVENT_GENERAL_CALL_SEC_BYTE_SENT : signals GENERAL CALL command second byte sent from master
  • EVENT_ARBITRATION_LOSS_DETECTED : signals losing arbitration by master

 protected function void
 svt_i2c_master::post_seq_item_get
 (  svt_i2c_master_transaction xact , ref bit drop  ) 

Callback issued after pulling a transaction descriptor out of its input TLM port, but before acting on the transaction descriptor in any way.

xact - A reference to the transaction descriptor object of interest.

drop - A ref argument, which if set by the user's callback implementation causes the component to discard the transaction descriptor without further action
